p: Additionally, HCA was applied as unsupervised pattern recognition method in order to confirm results obtained by PCA. The dendrograms obtained for different seasons, displayed in Fig 4, revealed segregation of different Callistemon species into three main clusters endorsing the results of PCA. HCA dendrograms revealed the near distance of C. viminalis and C. rigidus in spring, summer and autumn as presented in Fig 4A, 4B & 4C, respectively. On the other side, regarding winter season, HCA showed nearness of C. citrinus, C. rigidus in relation to C. viminalis.
